name: Silinebilir Satış Siparişleri
query:
SELECT
    `tabSales Order`.name AS "Satış Siparişi",
    `tabSales Order`.customer AS "Müşteri",
    `tabSales Order`.transaction_date AS "Tarih",
    `tabSales Order`.status AS "Durum",
    `tabSales Order`.per_delivered AS "Teslimat Oranı",
    `tabSales Order`.per_billed AS "Fatura Oranı",
    `tabSales Order`.grand_total AS "Tutar"
FROM
    `tabSales Order`
WHERE
    `tabSales Order`.docstatus = 1
    AND `tabSales Order`.status = 'Closed'
    AND `tabSales Order`.per_delivered = 0
    AND `tabSales Order`.per_billed = 0
    AND NOT EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 FROM `tabDelivery Note Item`
        WHERE `tabDelivery Note Item`.against_sales_order = `tabSales Order`.name
    )
ORDER BY
    `tabSales Order`.transaction_date DESC
